versions.basePromptText: A cinematic, photorealistic header for a modern website. The design is minimalist and elegant, featuring a clean layout on a slightly off-white background. Include a subtle, abstract logo on the left, generic navigation links, and a prominent, vibrant call-to-action button on the right.
